member.name: M:ifc.ifc_oc.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Byte)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_oc class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-OC04.
member.param: ifc.ifc_ci in use.
Address for IFC-OC04, in range of 0 to 63. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_oc.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_oc class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-OC04.
member.param: ifc.ifc_ci in use.
Address for IFC-OC04, in range of 0 to 63. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_oc.oc_out1(System.Byte)
member.summary: To configure output condition for OUT1.
member.param: 1 to activate OUT1 and 0 to deactivate OUT1. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_oc.oc_out1(System.Int32)
member.summary: To configure output condition for OUT1.
member.param: 1 to activate OUT1 and 0 to deactivate OUT1. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_oc.oc_out1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: To configure output condition for OUT1.
member.param: True to activate OUT1 and false to deactivate OUT1. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_oc.oc_pwm(System.Byte)
member.summary: To configure PWM output on OUT1.
member.param: PWM value in range of 0 to 255. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_oc.oc_out(System.Byte)
member.param: Output value in one byte. Bit 0 represent OUT1, bit 1 represend OUT2, bit 2 represent OUT3, and bit 3 represent OUT4. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_oc.oc_out(System.Int32)
member.param: Output value in one integer. Bit 0 represent OUT1, bit 1 represend OUT2, bit 2 represent OUT3, and bit 3 represent OUT4. (int)
